subject: Re: [junit] problem with httpunit
msgSnippet: ... Can you ping www.gmx.de? There might have been a temporary DNS problem when you ran the test. Such is the nature of tests against live network resources!
messageBody:
thecyriuz82 wrote:

> Hi everybody,
>
> today I tried to write my first httpunit test. And of course it
> don't run.
> Can anybody help me? At the moment I don't know why I can't get
> connection to the host.
> I get an Error meassage like the following:
>
> Time: 16,516
> There was 1 error:
> 1) testSearch(GoogleTest)java.net.UnknownHostException: www.gmx.de

Can you ping www.gmx.de? There might have been a temporary DNS problem
when you ran the test. Such is the nature of tests against live network
resources!

Good luck.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
